name: Santa's Reindeer Racing 2021
summary: In this game you get Santa Claus as your co-driver and Rudolph your team leader, as you race against the elves and the clock. If you have trouble with steering Rudolph and the rest of the reindeer, Santa can help you with some of his magic. Start by listening to Santa's instructions, or skip it and quick start the race from the pause menu. The snowy landscape might look familiar, if you have visited the Arctic Circle in Rovaniemi,...
